name: technologies
schema:
CREATE TABLE `technologies` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`name` text NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`website` text,
	`logo` text,
	`category` text,
	`type` text,
	`created_at` integer NOT NULL,
	`last_updated` integer NOT NULL,
	`status` text DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL
)
